name: Drying Duo
about: What it is:A two-piece anti-blemish spot-treatment set for overnight or on-the-go use, curated for troubled skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Acne and Blemishes.Highlighted Ingredients:- Salicylic Acid (Drying Lotion & Drying Patch): BHA exfoliant that helps dissolve away pore-clogging dead skin cells..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. ingredients: -Salicylic Acid (Drying Lotion & Drying Patch): BHA exfoliant that helps dissolve away pore-clogging dead skin cells..- Niacinamide (Drying Patch): Form of vitamin B3 used to retain moisture with skin-brightening benefits..- Vitamin C (Drying Patch): A potent antioxidant that supports collagen production...Drying Patch: .Acrylates Copolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Butylene Glycol, Pvp, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Niacinamide, Water/Aqua, Salicylic Acid, Centella Asiatica Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tetrahexyldecyl, Ascorbate, Laureth-7, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Extract, Phytosphingosine, Madecassoside...Drying Lotion: .Isopropyl Alcohol, Calamine, Camphor, Sulfur, Zinc Oxide, Talc, Glycerin, Salicylic Acid, Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).
